FAQ Which New Customer Alway ask
* Does HaBangNet offer IPv6?
> IPv6 is available on our USA and Europe Standard VPS Package only.

* Do you have a speedtest or IP for ping?
> Please visit our helpdesk for a speedtest on Download and Upload Speed.

* How is your I/O speed, and do you limit the speed?
> We do not limit the I/O speed, infact we provide Ultra Fast. Super Great for Database hosting. Click to view benchmarks

* Does the VPS come managed.
> No. This VPS is Fully Self-Managed.

* Can I know your Uptime?
> Our Uptime is provided by a third party uptime monitoring company at https://www.habangnet.com/status.html

* Any Restrictions?
> NO TOR, NO Torrents, NO illegal Activity, NO SPAM, NO Sending Bulk and/or Commercial information, No DDoS attacks, NO Brute Force and Hacking Activity.

* I got more questions regards to your VPS.
> You can visit our VPS FAQ website for more information.

* What Virtualization Technology do you use for the VPS.
> Offer listed here is on OpenVZ, KVM is available on our website.

* What payment option you accept.
> We accept Paypal, Paypal Express Checkout, Alipay, WeChat Pay, Wire Transfer, Local Bank Transfer in (China and Hong Kong).

Got Questions? Send us your question at our online Contact Form.
